revised_title: Horn-Like Excrescences on Fingers and Toes: A Medical Case Study
tldr: This article presents a case study of a young man with a rare condition causing horn-like excrescences to grow on his fingers and toes. The growths would appear, grow to a certain length, and then fall off, only to regrow again. The author, Dr. Rich. Wroe, provides a detailed account of the boy's condition and sends samples of the growths to Dr. Hans Sloane for further study.
